description: Officials in Terni, in the Umbrian hills, are hoping to find a "romantic" US city to twin with.
title: Terni: Italian home of St Valentine seeks US partner city
title_page: Terni: Italian home of St Valentine seeks US partner city - BBC News
maintext: "Every year, cities across Italy claim they are the most romantic, or that they are the city of love," he said. "But actually, Terni is the real deal - it is the birthplace of Saint Valentine."
